title: Co Hoedeman: animator
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Nederlandse Omroep Stichting, Tom Daly, Barrie Howells, Henk Suer and Nico Crama
brief_description: Academy Award-winning filmmaker, Co Hoedeman, divides his time between family, farm, and studio. This film, while showing all three aspects of his life, places particular emphasis on his work as an animator. He is shown working on a short animation clip, created especially for the film. Excerpts of his films are shown. Voice and narration by Richard Gilbert. (Award: Montreal)
